text.section: An applicant for a permit shall submit an application to the Secretary on the form that the Secretary requires.

section.section:
An application for a permit to operate a tissue bank shall include:
The name of the owner;
The classes of services that the tissue bank would provide; and
Any other information that the Secretary requires.

An application for a permit to represent or service a tissue bank shall include satisfactory evidence that the tissue bank to be represented or serviced and its director meet the requirements that the Secretary adopts under this subtitle.

text.section: The applicant shall pay to the Department the application fee set by the Secretary.
